channel.title: Network Analysis on Valerio Ciotti
channel.description: Recent content in Network Analysis on Valerio Ciotti

item.title: Hunting unicorns with Network analysis
item.description: If you were not one of the lucky people to participate at PyData 2024, no worriesâ€”you can find my talk on YouTube (see below). The talk is about the construction and analysis of a time-varying worldwide network of professional relationships among startups to predict long-term economic performance using network centrality measures. In my PyData talk, I provided an overview of how I built the worldwide startup network using CrunchBase data and the Networkx library.

item.title: My heart beats like a network
item.description: I was looking for a way to automate the process behind updating my site, and I found one.
